resources.string: Build With AI
Go
Try it
Generate text from text-only input
Sample app that summarizes text
Generate text from text-and-image input (multimodal)
Sample app for uploading images and asking about them
Build multi-turn conversations (chat)
Sample app demonstrating a conversational UI
Text
Enter text to summarize
Question
Upload an image and then ask a question
Add Image
Amount
How much did you spend?
Category
What type of purchase was it?
Message
Send
Question 1: What is your employment status? (Employed, Self-employed, Student, Retired, Unemployed)
Question 2: What is your primary source of income? (Salary, Freelance, Business, Investments, Other)
Question 3: What is your average monthly income?
Question 4: How stable is your income? (Fixed, Variable, Seasonal, Unpredictable)
Question 5: Do you have any secondary sources of income? If yes, how much on average?
Question 6: Do you have any dependents (children, parents, spouse) you financially support?
Question 7: How much do you spend on groceries each month?
Question 8: What is your average monthly utility bill cost? (Electricity, Water, Gas, Internet, etc.)
Question 9: How much do you spend on transportation (fuel, public transport, car maintenance)?"
Question 10: Do you have any regular subscriptions (Netflix, Spotify, Gym, Magazines, etc.)?"
Question 11: How much do you spend on entertainment and dining out?")
Question 12: How much do you spend on shopping (clothing, gadgets, accessories)?
Question 13: Do you set aside money for travel or vacations? If yes, how much per month?
Question 14: What is your total estimated monthly expenditure?
Question 15: Do you usually save money? (Yes/No)
Question 16: Do you currently have savings? If yes, how much on average do you save per month?
Question 17: How much would you like to save per month?
Question 18: Are you currently investing in stocks, mutual funds, crypto, or real estate? If yes, how much per month?
Question 19: What is your biggest financial challenge? (Overspending, Low Income, Debt, Saving, Other)
Question 20: Are there any specific financial habits you want to improve?
